body:
https://github.com/numpy/numpy/releases/tag/v1.22.2

For the setuptools constraint, see https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/20692 and https://github.com/numpy/numpy/pull/20985

The `pyproject.toml` actually pins to a specific version of setuptools, but I'm not sure if that version is actually required.
title: py-numpy: add v1.22.2
